commandDescription: Retrieve tests execution time for a given deployment
deploymentFlagDescription: id of the deployment to get tests execution time for
outputFlagDescription: where do you want to output the results
targetFlagDescription: target location to save the results (do not include the file name)
thresholdFlagDescription: return the tests execution time to only those above the threshold (in milliseconds)
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
